name: 5 Questions about Actors and Their Siblings | Celebrities

questions.text: You can call me POTUS or President Josiah 'Jed' Bartlet.
questions.explanation:
Martin Sheen & Sheen.

	Martin is the President Of The United States on NBC's 'The West Wing.'

questions.text: You know me as a member of the Brat Pack and the coach of the 'Mighty Ducks'. I am number 1's son, but I chose to go by his birth last name.
questions.explanation:
Emilio Estevez & Estevez.

	Emilio was once engaged to Demi Moore.

questions.text: I have quite a colorful past. I was engaged to Kelly Preston, I accidentally shot her in the arm, she left me. I dated a porn star. I was put on probation for drugs.
questions.explanation:
Charlie Sheen & Charles Sheen & Sheen.

	Charlie briefly dated porn star, Ginger Lynn Allen.

questions.text: Our dad directed this movie. My brother played Private First Class Franklin F. Bean, Jr. Dad was Sergeant Otis V. McKinney. I played Private First Class Harold Gessner. The movie 'Cadence.' Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Ramon Estevez.

	Martin Sheen directed Cadence. Charlie Sheen was PFC Bean.

questions.text: I was Betty Finn in the movie 'Heathers'. I am, also, part of the Estevez-Sheen Clan.
questions.explanation:
Renee Estevez & Renee.

	I was shocked when I discovered this little known fact.
